verbs.description: [V: impd] [ARG1: investigating] [ARGM-TMP: after man found dead on north side sunday morning] impd is investigating a homicide after a man was found dead on the north side sunday morning just after 8 00 a m authorities were dispatched to the 3700 block of n meridian st on the report of a deceased person at the address indianapolis indianapolis metropolitan police department ind impd
